items.sentence: Tom is better at speaking French than any of his classmates.
Tom went to Australia and stayed there the rest of his life.
Tom wondered if Mary would slap him if he tried to kiss her.
I gave Tom my word that I wouldn\'t talk to Mary about that.
When was the last time you had to remind me to do something?
When was the last time you told your wife she was beautiful?
Which player are you paying the most attention to this year?
If I were you, I\'d think twice before going down that path.
It\'s one of the most difficult things I\'ve ever had to do.
Tom didn\'t feel he could do what Mary was asking him to do.
